mapper.select: select id from t_stu_hw_rslt where account = #{account} and homework_id = #{homeworkId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_stu_hw_rslt (account, homework_id, result_id) values (#{account},#{homeworkId},#{id})
mapper.delete: delete from t_stu_hw_rslt where homework_id = #{homeworkId} and result_id = #{id};
